ygData.subject: Re: PoF
ygData.msgSnippet: ... oops my bad, its Alter Plane of Hate that I have.  But since there is no plane of Hate yet I guess no one knows where it takes you to. :) Lomack, Knight
ygData.messageBody:
>
>where did you find the spell? what component does it need?
>and i'd assume it would take you to the normal zone.

>> I'm just curious here. I'd probably never think of doing anything like
>> this unless I knew the location was totally safe.
>> Does anyone know roughly where in PoF the wizard gate spell takes you to?

oops my bad, its Alter Plane of Hate that I have. But since there is no
plane of Hate yet I guess no one knows where it takes you to. :)

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
